data.eml:eml: Cordulegaster sarracenia, n. sp. (Odonata: Cordulegastridae) from east Texas and western Louisiana, with a key to adult Cordulegastridae of the New World

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Abbott, John C., Hibbitts, Troy D. (2011): Cordulegaster sarracenia, n. sp. (Odonata: Cordulegastridae) from east Texas and western Louisiana, with a key to adult Cordulegastridae of the New World. Zootaxa 2899: 60-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277707
